mainPage.paragraph:
I am Tatiana Ende.
I have been living in Antalya for 20 years.
I will be happy to take you into the world of Turkey!

blocks.title: Purchase of real estate
blocks.title-article: Where and how to buy an apartment in Turkey?
blocks.paragraph:
Full support in the selection,
purchase and registration of real estate
ownership
blocks.text:
The presidential election took place, Erdogan won, everyone is celebrating. Everyone is very happy, someone is not crazy. Most people have heard the name Anne Frank, and many have read her diary, which details the time she and her the family spent time on the run during the German occupation of Amsterdam during World War II. Less well known are Miep and Jan Gies, two men who helped shelter the Frank family and preserved Anne Frank's diary after she was captured. In this episode, Alison Leslie Gold, co-author of Miep's memoir, talks about their story and what we can learn from their stories. And we'll hear from the co-creators and the star of the National Geographic limited series Little Light about how everyone can step up and become a hero. National Geographic Little Light is about how everyone can step up and become a hero.

For more information about this episode, visit natgeo.com/overheard.

blocks.title: Medical tourism
blocks.title-article: How to start medical tourism to Turkey?
blocks.paragraph:
Assistance in the selection and
arrangement of tours for the purpose
of a health program

aboutPage.paragraph:
My name is Tatiana Ende.

I have been living in Turkey, Antalya for 20 years. Married, two sons. I am fluent in Turkish and know almost everything about Antalya.

I will be happy to help you with solving your issues related to tourism, relocation and adaptation in Turkey.
aboutPage.contactMe: Contact me in any way convenient for you.
